biotools.summary: The Pathway Activity Profiling is an R package for predicting the activity of metabolic pathways based solely on a metabolomics data set containing a list of metabolites identified and their respective abundances in different biological samples. It generates hypothesis that improves the final biological interpretation.

bioschemas.name: PAPi
